entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Rain beginning overnight. Wind southeast 50 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 this evening then increasing to 50 gusting to 70 overnight. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Wednesday 19 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Rain. High 8.
entry.summary: Rain. Wind southeast 60 km/h gusting to 80 except gusting to 100 over exposed coastal sections in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 40 gusting to 60 in the afternoon. High 8. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Wednesday 19 April 2023
